articles.description: Sales at the grocer soared 9.3 in the past three weeks, which included the key Christmas trading period, compared with the same time a year ago.
articles.content:
Morrisons will be hosting drive-through coronavirus vaccinations from next week. 
It was revealed car parks will be used as Covid-19 vaccine centres, with three stores hosting jabs from Monday and a… [+3245 chars]
